page.title: 09MEDIA AT COMMONSIDE
page.content: MOST PEOPLE IN THE AREA HAVE A COLOUR TELEVISION WHICH RECEIVES FOUR CHANNELS NAMELY,BORDER TELEVISION, BBC1, BBC2 AND CHANNEL FOUR. SOME PEOPLE HAVE VIDEO RECORDERS TO RECORD PROGRAMMES AND TO SHOW FILMS WHICH THEY CAN HIRE FROM HAWICK 7 MILES AWAY. DAILY PAPERS AND MAGAZINES ARE DELIVERED BY THE POSTMAN FOR A SMALL CHARGE AND THE TRAVELLING LIBRARY CALLS EVERY FORTNIGHT. THE LOCAL PAPERS ARE THE HAWICK NEWS,PUBLISHED WEEKLY ON FRIDAY, WHICH COVERS THE SURROUNDING DISTRICTS,AND THE SOUTHERN REPORTER WHICH IS PUBLISHED ON THURSDAYS AT SELKIRK AND COVERS THE WHOLE OF THE BORDERS REGION. THIS IS THE PAPER USED FOR FORTHCOMING LIVESTOCK SALES AND STOCK PRICES IN THE LOCALITY WHICH ARE SO IMPORTANT TO THE LIVELIHOOD OF THE AREA.
